name: Super Bloomer!
description:
Super Bloomer Synopsis: 
Adorable dog farmer Petunia's world is drying up more and more every day. But when Petunia finds a mysterious beanstalk outside of her home, she climbs up to find Forsythia--the world of the gods. Upon discovering that this world is just as barren as her own, Petunia soon finds that the fate of both Forsythia and her own world rests on her. Magical watering can in paw, Petunia must bring the world back in bloom.

Made for a Game Jam.
